story.title: The Last Samurai Student
story.synopsis: Akira, a modern high school student, discovers he's the last descendant of a legendary samurai clan. When ancient demons threaten Tokyo, he must master his ancestral sword techniques to protect his friends and the city.

characters.name: Akira Takeshi
characters.prompt:
Professional shonen manga character design sheet, full body reference.

Character: Akira Takeshi, 17-year-old male protagonist
Physical: Spiky black hair with natural texture, determined brown eyes with slight bags underneath (from training), athletic lean build (175cm, 68kg), small scar on left cheek
Clothing: Modern Japanese school uniform - slightly wrinkled white shirt with rolled sleeves, navy blazer worn open, red striped tie loosened, dark grey pants, worn brown leather shoes. Alternative outfit: Traditional black hakama with white gi top, wooden sandals
Personality: Determined, brave, slightly hot-headed, fiercely loyal, self-doubting but grows confident

Layout: Character turnaround showing front view, 3/4 view, side profile, and back view
Style: Clean black ink lineart with varied line weights, professional shonen manga character sheet
Background: Pure white, minimal cast shadows for depth
Quality: High detail, anatomically correct proportions, consistent design across all views

Additional: Include 6 facial expressions - neutral (calm), happy (wide grin), angry (furrowed brow), determined (intense gaze), surprised (wide eyes), exhausted (heavy breathing)
Reference style: Similar to Izuku Midoriya from My Hero Academia or Tanjiro from Demon Slayer, professional Shonen Jump quality
